categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Roasted Chando Peppers was a dish that contained roasted strips of orange chando peppers, which were a sweet variety of pepper that originated from the planet Chandrila. The dish also contained a smaller green vegetable. At some point following the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included a recipe for Roasted Chando Peppers in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook.

In the book, Tuggs claimed that while working at Takodana Castle on the planet Takodana he had usually used chando peppers to make fruit jelly; however, since the castle had been destroyed he had prefered generally roasted them instead and served them alongside other dishes that needed additional flavor.

Roasted Chando Peppers was created as a recipe for the 2019 cookbook Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Marc Sumerak and Chelsea Monroe-Cassel. The out-of-universe recipe uses orange bell peppers and a filling made with white wine vinegar, a splash of lemon juice, olive oil, honey, dried sage, a pinch of pepper, and rinsed capers.
